findings.title: No error handling in case of overflow
findings.description: There is a lack of underflow/overflow error handling in vempire/src/utils.rs.

findings.title: Spelling mistakes and typos reducing code readability
Missing overflow/underflow checks in cargo.toml
findings.description: The arithmetics in utils.rs can be overflowed and/or underflowed pertaining to basic math. This can cause the rewards of vemp as primary and other tokens as secondary to be calculated wrongly.
